cause.description:
the Party for Every Nation who believe In the best for the Society.
Our aim is to make the world the best it can be, and by that we mean free it from war, hunger, famine etc. the only way to do this is to ebolish the monetary belief, the liberal mind and tyranni.
1. the world cannot handle another bush/fogh
2. make people believe in peace, freedom and justice
3. make the world a better place
